who_am_i_first_description: My name is Pawel Tkaczyk. I am a designer who has been professionally specializing in mobile application and website development for over 10 years. My skills include both raster and vector graphics. In addition, I have experience in managing development teams in the implementation of web and cross-platform (iOS/Android) projects.
who_am_i_second_description: For the past year, I have had the pleasure of working at the Central Informatics Center as a Senior UX/UI Designer on projects such as ePayments and the mObywatel 2.0 application. I welcome challenges, creating and implementing my own ideas, proven methods or improving already implemented solutions.
